15: וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And when he had spoken</n> עִמִּ֔י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>such words</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>to these</n> נָתַ֧תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>unto me I set</n> פָנַ֛י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> אַ֖רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>toward the ground</n> וְנֶאֱלָֽמְתִּי׃ <sup>481 </sup> <n>and I became dumb</n>
16: וְהִנֵּ֗ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> כִּדְמוּת֙ <sup>1823 </sup> <n>And behold [one] like the similitude</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> נֹגֵ֖עַ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>touched</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שְׂפָתָ֑י <sup>8193 </sup> <n>my lips</n> וָאֶפְתַּח־ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>then I opened</n> פִּ֗י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> וָאֲדַבְּרָה֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and spake</n> וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> הָעֹמֵ֣ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>unto him that stood</n> לְנֶגְדִּ֔י <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> אֲדֹנִ֗י <sup>113 </sup> <n>before me O my lord</n> בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <sup>4759 </sup> <n>by the vision</n> נֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>are turned</n> צִירַי֙ <sup>6735 </sup> <n>my sorrows</n> עָלַ֔י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> עָצַ֖רְתִּי <sup>6113 </sup> <n>upon me and I have retained</n> כֹּֽחַ׃ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>no strength</n>
17: וְהֵ֣יךְ <sup>1963 </sup> <n>For how</n> יוּכַ֗ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>can</n> עֶ֤בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>the servant</n> אֲדֹנִי֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>of this my lord</n> זֶ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>such</n> לְדַבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>talk</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲדֹ֣נִי <sup>113 </sup> <n>of my lord</n> זֶ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>such</n> וַאֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מֵעַ֙תָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַעֲמָד־ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>there remained</n> בִּ֣י כֹ֔חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>no strength</n> וּנְשָׁמָ֖ה <sup>5397 </sup> <n>in me neither is there breath</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> נִשְׁאֲרָה־ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>left</n> בִֽי׃
18: וַיֹּ֧סֶף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>Then there came again</n> וַיִּגַּע־ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>and touched</n> בִּ֛י כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <sup>4758 </sup> <n>me [one] like the appearance</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of a man</n> וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽנִי׃ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and he strengthened</n>
19: וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֧א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>fear</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>O man</n> חֲמֻד֛וֹת <sup>2530 </sup> <n>beauty</n> שָׁל֥וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>not peace</n> לָ֖ךְ חֲזַ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>[be] unto thee be strong</n> וַחֲזָ֑ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>yea be strong</n> וּֽבְדַבְּר֤וֹ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And when he had spoken</n> עִמִּי֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הִתְחַזַּ֔קְתִּי <sup>2388 </sup> <n>unto me I was strengthened</n> וָאֹ֥מְרָ֛ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> יְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>speak</n> אֲדֹנִ֖י <sup>113 </sup> <n>Let my lord</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> חִזַּקְתָּֽנִי׃ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>for thou hast strengthened</n>
20: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> הֲיָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>he Knowest</n> לָמָּה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> בָּ֣אתִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>thou wherefore I come</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> וְעַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>shall now</n> אָשׁ֔וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>unto thee? and now will I return</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> שַׂ֣ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>with the prince</n> פָּרָ֑ס <sup>6539 </sup> <n>of Persia</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יוֹצֵ֔א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and when I am gone forth</n> וְהִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> שַׂר־ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>lo the prince</n> יָוָ֖ן <sup>3120 </sup> <n>of Grecia</n> בָּֽא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n>
21: אֲבָל֙ <sup>61 </sup> <n>But</n> אַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>I will shew</n> לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרָשׁ֥וּם <sup>7559 </sup> <n>thee that which is noted</n> בִּכְתָ֖ב <sup>3791 </sup> <n>in the scripture</n> אֱמֶ֑ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>of truth</n> וְאֵ֨ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> אֶחָ֜ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and [there is] none</n> מִתְחַזֵּ֤ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>that holdeth</n> עִמִּי֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> מִיכָאֵ֖ל <sup>4317 </sup> <n>with me in these things but Michael</n> שַׂרְכֶֽם׃ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>your prince</n> פ
